item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

5/28/2012's (Memorial Day!) location will be:

BAR

Known for being a big name in New Haven Style Pizza and brewing their own Beers, BAR is a part Restaurant, part Pub, part Night Club located on Crown Street.  They also sport a pool table for those interested, but there may be a wait for that.

Memorial Day is observed on this Monday, so we're going with an old casual Favorite.

No particular specials, just whatever they run that day.

A.J. will host and can be reached at 315-345-9348.

Also: As many of you are familiar, New Haven hosts the International Festival of Arts and Ideas every June.  This is a great cultural event for the City and the surrounding areas.  NHCer Kevin does a lot of work with the Festival, and will be available at this happy hour with some brochures and a laptop with videos for anyone wishing to learn more about this years Festival!

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please put this in your comment.

Hope to see you all there.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Text or Call the listed Host at the number they have provided in the description.
